sourcesContent:
import React,{useState} from 'react' const Todo = () => { const dates=new Date() document.getElementById("date").innerHTML=dates const[text,updatetext]=useState(" ") const[text2,texts]=useState(text) const change=(event)=> { updatetext(event.target.value) } const display=()=> { texts(text) } let card=document.createElement("div") card.setAttribute("class","card") card.setAttribute("id","card_div") document.getElementById("cards").appendChild(card) let card_header=document.createElement("div") card_header.setAttribute("class","card-header") card_header.setAttribute("id","card_head") card.appendChild(card_header) let header=document.createElement("h4") header.innerText="USER" card_header.appendChild(header) let body=document.createElement("div") body.setAttribute("class","card-body") body.setAttribute("id","card_body") card.appendChild(body) let para=document.createElement("p") para.setAttribute("class","card-text") para.innerHTML=text2 body.appendChild(para) return ( <>

My Day

Lists

{/*

{text2}

*/}
) } export default Todo
